content.rendered: Patti Scialfa is an American singer-songwriter. Scialfa has been a member of the E Street Band since 1984 and has been married to Bruce Springsteen since 1991.  Together they have raised three children, Evan James, Jessica Rae and Sam Ryan. Sam is now married to Alex Reph and has graced them with a darling granddaughter, Lily Harper.

yoast_head_json.title: Patti Scialfa | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Patti Scialfa is an American singer-songwriter. Scialfa has been a member of the E Street Band since 1984 and has been married to Bruce Springsteen since 1991.  Together they have raised three children, Evan James, Jessica Rae and Sam Ryan. Sam is now married to Alex Reph and has graced them with a darling granddaughter, Lily Harper.
